entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Greenstone (Beardmore)

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
